data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Al Quassim who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Quassim, Saudi Arabia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 975,916, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 5,384 believers in the state of Al Quassim the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Over 95.98 percent of the people of Al Quassim are far from Jesus.
Father, I pray that the Arab, Tihami people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Arab, Tihami people know you.
Spirit, train the church of Al Quassim, Saudi Arabia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Al Quassim, Saudi Arabia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Al Quassim, Saudi Arabia will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

location.name: Al Quassim
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Syrian, Arab, Yemeni, Javanese, Punjabi, Persian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Syrian (265,000), Arab, Yemeni (195,000), Javanese (31,000), Punjabi (821,000), Persian (240,000)
